definition: sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
honorific term for one's deceased father/(arch.) great-great-grandfather
bed of straw and pillow of clay (idiom)/the correct etiquette for a filial son during the mourning period
euphemism (tactful expression for sth unpleasant such as death)
eldest grandson (to sustain upper storeys of ancestor worship)
to announce sb's demise/to predict death
to kneel as in prayer (without sitting back on the heels)
